values.policy: {"rules":[{"action":{"type":"expire"},"description":"Expire untagged images older than 14 days","rulePriority":1,"selection":{"countNumber":14,"countType":"sinceImagePushed","countUnit":"days","tagStatus":"untagged"}},{"action":{"type":"expire"},"description":"Keep last 30 tagged images","rulePriority":2,"selection":{"countNumber":30,"countType":"imageCountMoreThan","tagPrefixList":["latest","v","release","prod","dev"],"tagStatus":"tagged"}}]}

values.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
values.name: node-hello-vpce-sg

after.policy: {"rules":[{"action":{"type":"expire"},"description":"Expire untagged images older than 14 days","rulePriority":1,"selection":{"countNumber":14,"countType":"sinceImagePushed","countUnit":"days","tagStatus":"untagged"}},{"action":{"type":"expire"},"description":"Keep last 30 tagged images","rulePriority":2,"selection":{"countNumber":30,"countType":"imageCountMoreThan","tagPrefixList":["latest","v","release","prod","dev"],"tagStatus":"tagged"}}]}

alb_dns_name.description: Public DNS name of the ALB

ecr_repository_name.description: ECR repository name (use as ECR_REPOSITORY_NAME in GitHub secrets)

ecs_cluster_name.description: ECS cluster name (use as ECS_CLUSTER in GitHub secrets)

ecs_service_name.description: ECS service name (use as ECS_SERVICE in GitHub secrets)

description.constant_value: Security group for interface VPC endpoints

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for HTTPS listener (required if enable_https=true)

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended)

container_port.description: Container port exposed by the app

enable_https.description: Whether to create an HTTPS listener on the ALB (requires ACM cert ARN)

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path

image_tag.description: Image tag to run from ECR

max_capacity.description: Maximum number of tasks for autoscaling

min_capacity.description: Minimum number of tasks for autoscaling
